verses.text: \w And|strong="G2547"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* from \w thence|strong="G2547"\w*, and \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w coasts|strong="G3725"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the farther \w side|strong="G4008"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w resort|strong="G4848"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* he was \w wont|strong="G1486"\w*, he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* came \w to|strong="G4334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Is it \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* to put \w away|strong="G0630"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*? \w tempting|strong="G3985"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w did|strong="G1781"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w command|strong="G1781"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w suffered|strong="G2010"\w* to \w write|strong="G1125"\w* a \w bill|strong="G0975"\w* of \w divorcement|strong="G0647"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to put her \w away|strong="G0630"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w For|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the hardness of|strong="G4641"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G4641"\+w* \+w he wrote|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w precept|strong="G1785"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w* \+w of the creation|strong="G2937"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w male|strong="G0730"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w female|strong="G2338"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w cause|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2641"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w leave|strong="G2641"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cleave|strong="G4347"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w twain|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*: \+w so then|strong="G5620"\+w* \+w they are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3765"\+w* \+w twain|strong="G1417"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w What|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w hath joined together|strong="G4801"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G5563"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w put asunder|strong="G5563"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \add matter\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall put away|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w marry|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w*, \+w committeth adultery|strong="G3429"\+w* \+w against|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a woman|strong="G1135"\+w* \+w shall put away|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w husband|strong="G0435"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w be married to|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w*, \+w she committeth adultery|strong="G3429"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* young \w children|strong="G3813"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \add his\add* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* those that \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \add them\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, he was much \w displeased|strong="G0023"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Suffer|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w the little children|strong="G3813"\+w* \+w to come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w forbid|strong="G2967"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w of such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w a little child|strong="G3813"\+w*, \+w he shall|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w there|strong="G0846"\+w*\+w in|strong="G1519"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G1723"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* up in his \w arms|strong="G1723"\w*, \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1607"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was gone \w forth|strong="G1607"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, there \w came|strong="G4370"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w running|strong="G4370"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kneeled|strong="G1120"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Good|strong="G0018"\w* \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w callest thou|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w*? \+add there is\+add* \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w but|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w*, \+add that is\+add*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Thou knowest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the commandments|strong="G1785"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G3431"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w commit adultery|strong="G3431"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G5407"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w kill|strong="G5407"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G2813"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w steal|strong="G2813"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G5576"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w bear false witness|strong="G5576"\+w*, \+w Defraud|strong="G0650"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w Honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* have I \w observed|strong="G5442"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w youth|strong="G3503"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w beholding|strong="G1689"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w One thing|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w lackest|strong="G5302"\+w*: \+w go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w sell|strong="G4453"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w thou hast|strong="G2192"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to the poor|strong="G4434"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou shalt have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w treasure|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1204"\+w*, \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w the cross|strong="G4716"\+w*, \+w and follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he was \w sad|strong="G4768"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* that \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, and went \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2258"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w possessions|strong="G2933"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* looked round \w about|strong="G4017"\w*, and \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj  \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w hardly|strong="G1423"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w they that have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w riches|strong="G5536"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*!\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* were \w astonished|strong="G2284"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answereth|strong="G0611"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, and \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w hard|strong="G1422"\+w* \+w is it|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w for them that trust|strong="G3982"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w riches|strong="G5536"\+w* \+w to enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*!\wj*

\wj  \+w It is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w easier|strong="G2123"\+w* \+w for a camel|strong="G2574"\+w* \+w to go|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w through|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the eye|strong="G5168"\+w* \+w of a needle|strong="G4476"\+w*, \+w than|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w for a rich man|strong="G4145"\+w* \+w to enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they were \w astonished|strong="G1605"\w* out of \w measure|strong="G4057"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*?

¶ \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lo|strong="G2400"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* have \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w he shall receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w an hundredfold|strong="G1542"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w*, \+w houses|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sisters|strong="G0079"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mothers|strong="G3384"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lands|strong="G0068"\+w*, \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w persecutions|strong="G1375"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G0165"\+w* \+w to come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w eternal|strong="G0166"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* going \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w amazed|strong="G2284"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as they \w followed|strong="G0190"\w*, they were \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, and \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* what things \w should|strong="G3195"\w* \w happen|strong="G4819"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, come \w unto|strong="G4365"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, we \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou shouldest \w do|strong="G4160"\w* for \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\w* we shall \w desire|strong="G0154"\w*.
